data.text: @dmwoof @GovAndyBeshear @StevenStackMD Polio vaccine works because vaccines work. Your lack of education on what vaccines are and how they work doesn't allow you to spread misinformation in the form a poorly thought out opinion. Quit falling for conservative media lies.
@LyffeIsGud @GovAndyBeshear Yes, stay indoors and be scared when then best preventative has always been sunlight/vitamin D.

@TheBendu2_0 @GovAndyBeshear How many of them got early treatment? Or were all these c19 patients told to just stay home til they couldn’t breathe? Early Tx options exist, they save lives. Instead sharing cases/deaths be proactive w/ solutions. vax is a crapshoot, read article here: https://t.co/GQtG3ZARTN

@LyffeIsGud @GovAndyBeshear Why in September in 2020, for example, did we have a little over 8 Covid deaths per day on average in Kentucky and now regularly over 40 deaths per day if so many people vaccinated and vaccinations so effective?

@GovAndyBeshear Why are people dying after getting the vaccines ? Has it ever acurred to maybe request autopsies to recognize the root cause ..why has cancers shot up so much and all other diseases? https://t.co/VymNWs9LZ2

@GovAndyBeshear When you force something with no facts to back it up It goes against the people's free will. Mask don't prevent a virus and for sure the vaccines don't either.
The past proves that all flu viruses are just that,a flu virus and people who have weak immune systems unfortunately die
